Onboarding.phrase: Hello {name}, we are glad that you are here!
My name is Figo. I will be your personal digital assistant during your stay here. You can ask me anything and I will try to get it done for you.
If you want to communicate with me, just cue me by saying my name Figo
You can ask me things from making dinner, spa, event reservations to the small things like giving you a wake up call in the morning.
Why don't you give it a try. Ask me what fun things are going on at the hotel tomorrow.
Glad you asked. If you're interested in dancing,there is a salsa dancing event tomorrow in the main lounge. If you would rather relax, The Jonas Brothers will be playing tomorrow by the Pool.
See! That was easy. I am a voice activated system so I can hear your request from anywhere in the room.

Of course, if you would rather speak to a staff and not me, I can make that happen as well. Just say 'I prefer to speak to a staff during my stay' and I will turn myself off. Otherwise, I will be more than happy to assist you.
Whatever you decide, I will always be here whenever you need me.
This concludes the setup phase. Thanks for setting me up and it was really nice talking to you.
